title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.40 - Exclusions from paddock
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.40 - Exclusions from paddock

State Regulations

Racing associations shall exclude from the paddock, in the interest of public safety, all those persons who have no immediate
business with the horses entered except the members of the commission, the
commission's staff and special representatives, and those having special
permission from the association. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.40

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
